title: 10/6/2015 - Over $650 Million in savings possible on Montana electric bills by growing wind ...
text: ( Source : AWEA - American Wind Energy Association ) October 6, 2015 Helena, MT , Oct. 6, 2015 - Montana households and business owners will be able to keep more money in their pockets by the state continuing to grow its wind energy resources
